duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow provided scripts, screenplays, or outlines to ensure editing and VFX align with the creative vision.
Enhance footage by incorporating sound elements, including music selection and voice-overs.
Apply visual effects (VFX) to enhance the quality and impact of the footage.
Work with the internal post-production and creative directors to bring creative visions to life.
Enhance and correct lighting, color, and any flawed footage to achieve the desired visual aesthetics.
Collaborate with the team to ensure the final product meets the highest standards of quality and creativity.
Stay updated with industry trends and advancements to continuously improve skills and work.

education_certification.credential: Proficiency in relevant editing software and VFX tools (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, etc.)
